safety_precautions: avoid direct contact with skin or eyes with wood glue

steps.description: Clean the cracked area with a clean cloth to remove any dust or debris.
Apply wood glue into the crack.
Use clamps to hold the cracked area together while the glue dries.
Once the glue is dried, sand the area to make it smooth.
If the crack is still visible, apply wood filler to the area and let it dry.
After the filler is dried, sand the area again until it is smooth and even with the rest of the chair back.
Apply paint or finish to match the rest of the chair.

tips: Make sure the glue is fully dried before proceeding to the next step.
When sanding, always go in the direction of the wood grain to avoid scratches.
Choose a wood filler that matches the color of your chair for best results.
